data.title: Southern Research
data.meta_description: Southern Research offers advanced technologies and contract research services that advance drug discovery and development, emerging infectious disease research, medicinal chemistry, toxicology, and more. Learn about our specialized facilities for BSL-3 infectious disease research and in vivo studies.
data.text:
Research Services

We are committed to scientific and operational excellence in support of our clients’ objectives. With expertise in bioanalytical sciences, medicinal chemistry, computational chemistry, cancer, infectious diseases, and toxicology, we support the entire drug discovery and development pipeline as well as testing of environmental and occupational hazards.

Expertise

Our teams work to discover treatments and cures for diseases like cancer, Parkinson’s and COVID-19. In concert with state and national partners, we research solutions that prevent disease, improve quality of life and reduce health disparities across the U.S.

STEM

We activate the next generation of scientists through our STEM education programming, field trips, in-class demonstrations, and camp activities. Our experts create fun laboratory experiments and STEM experiences with real-world applications.
